Chimera

Chimera is the name given to numerous creatures which appear to be composed of discrete portions of other creatures, especially those created by the artifice of intelligent mortals by the application of Magic. The term is only properly applied to creatures whose complete form is such, and should not be applied to a creature which is assembled for parts of separate creatures.

Vinewyltt's Chimeras

Godmage Vinewyltt created a numerous Chimeras during his time:

  • Gryphon
  • Chimera
  • Cockatrice
